QuestData.Title: Escape from Umbrafen
QuestData.Description: You must help me get out of here!$B$BI was gathering herbs nearby when a handful of these little savages abducted me. I tried to fight them off, but there were too many of them.$B$BHelp me return to the Cenarion Refuge and away from these cruel wretches and their vile magic!
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Kayra Longmane to the Cenarion Refuge in Zangarmarsh. Report to Ysiel Windsinger when you've completed this task.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Ysiel Windsinger at the Cenarion Refuge in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.RewardText: You rescued one of my druids. We could never repay you, $n.$B$BYou have my thanks as well as that of the expedition.
